description: Details required by Condition 3b (doors) and 3c (windows) of listed building consent ref: 2021/3891/L dated 12/04/2022 for the "Erection of single storey side extension following demolition of single storey outbuilding; alterations to fenestration including insertion of 2x rooflights in main roof and creation of door access to newly created bow terrace at 3rd floor level; raised masonry balustrade to bow terrace; removal of glazed cover above front area and installation of new metal balustrade; alterations to rear terraces; removal of balustrade on crown roof; replacement windows; various internal alterations at all levels. All in association with conversion of 2x self-contained dwellings (No. 7 and 7B) to form a single dwelling"
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
